entry.title: Violet Birds in Emerald Skies
entry.summary:
Author: Niveara

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,309Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 325

Summary: Hal.exe stopped working. This child, this Sparrow, was THE Sparrow? Like the Champion of Predator, Wielder of Violet Light, Paragon of Love, Sparrow? The Star Sapphire with ‘rings for eyes’ that Kilowog, Green Lantern 1-9-8-6, was always going on and on about? The individual Carol, Star Sapphire 1-9-6-2, was always saying was a 'stain’ against the Zamaron’s Star Sapphires Corps?But they were just an itty bitty little baby.“You’re joking right” he teased assuming this was just Sinestro trying his hand at humor “please tell me your joking. Surely a 6 year old human child isn’t THE Sparrow”“You are correct” Sinestro agreed flatly a small smile forming upon his face as Hal relaxed at his response “a 6 year old human child is not THE Sparrow”“Oh thank-“ Hal started only to get cut off as Sinestro finished his thoughts.“It is my understanding that the child is only 4 and a half”ORTim Drake becomes a Star Sapphire shortly after watching the Flying Graysons fall. This has consequences.

entry.title: Young Justice Can Have a Little Evil As a Treat
entry.summary:
Author: Brownies96

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,115Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 69

Summary: Tim snorts, “Right. Obviously, that’s not the full story, but you were in space so we’re good.” He activates the tablet and shows Hal familiar paperwork. “I’ve come to the conclusion that if the League is going to treat me like I’m an unstable rogue, they’re going to have to commit to the bit.”After being treated like unwanted children all their lives, Tim, Kon, Cassie, and Bart start to realise that the adulthood set out before them isn't much better than the past their leaving behind. They decide it's time to make their own way in the world, even if it means being labelled as 'evil'

entry.title: Gilded Cage With an Open Door
entry.summary:
Author: Cat_astrophe_Writer

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,101Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 516

Summary: “I would ask if it was truly necessary to incapacitate that many of my men, Detective, but you do tend to turn to the dramatics when clamoring for my attention.” Ra’s, despite his words on the temporary loss of his men, seemed completely unbothered with the vigilante that stood before him, bo-staff turned towards his throat ready to strike. Apparently his Beloved hadn’t appreciated the most recent gift, which isn’t a first but such a reaction over a book is somewhat surprising considering similar gifts did not come to bring the same reaction. Ra’s wouldn’t deny his curiosity in regards as to what provoked such hate in those beautifully blue eyes, but there is more than hate behind those glaciers. “To what do I owe the pleasure of your visit, my Beloved?”Aka: Tim Drake doesn't know how to say "Please Hypnotize me, I need my brain to shut up."

entry.title: in a cruel nature
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,719Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 153

Summary: “I don’t understand why I have to accompany him.” Timothy groaned out as he rolled his eyes at Bruce’s orders. “It’s only for one night, Timothy.” Bruce insisted while maintaining his stoic attitude as he stood before Tim. Despite the lack of the cowl, Bruce spoke to him as if he was giving orders on the field, the gravitas in his voice was heavy. “Despite his nasty attitude, I doubt that there isn’t any desperate teenager out there willing to put up with it for one night.” Tim bitterly replied, and he wasn’t lying either. Damian had grown up into a fine man, inheriting both of his parents’ innate charm and attractiveness. “Please, Ducky.” Bruce pleaded, his voice softer with fondness as he called Tim his favorite pet name. “Fucking hell, alright!” Tim finally conceded at the sight of Bruce begging. “I’ll go to prom with Damian.” Under his breath, he added. “What a shitty fucking promposal.” “Do try to make yourself look decent, Drake.” At that moment, Damian appeared at the door. “I refuse to make a fool out of myself.” Damian takes Timothy Drake as his date for the Prom.

entry.title: Chained: To Wield the Blade we have Forged
entry.summary:
Author: Tinerian

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 156,673Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 366

Summary: Now bound together as Master and Submissed, Tim and Jason have nearly omnipotent levels of dangerously unpredictable power at their fingertips. Anyone finding out they hold this power could unravel everything, but the web of lies and secrets they're spinning could destroy them just as easily, and the threat of whatever impending doom prompted the Contract to be made in the first place hangs over their heads like the sword of Damacles.When you hold power over all life and death, how do you decide who not to save?If power is the great corrupter, is it possible for a God to be good?If you put a man in prison for life, would it have been more honest and merciful to slay him with your own two hands?Is a fundamentally evil universe worth preserving?These are the questions that will haunt them, but so too will they be haunted by their love for each other, the wonderful absurdity of joy, goofy ass happenstance, friendship, and lots of playful bickering.Join Tim and Jason on their journey to becoming the ultimate problematic 24/7 BDSM power couple!Estimated final word count: 500,000+
